name: NO DISC
description:
NO DISC INSERTED

experience all the thrill of watching a DVD logo bounce around the screen...

savor the joy of a perfect corner bounce...

cancel your streaming subscriptions... (haha j/k....unless???)

Use arrows keys to "influence" where the logo goes, or let it run on it's own. This game has no secrets/endings/exits/etc.

-----

Made with bitsy, bitsy-boilerplate, and bitsy-hacks. 

(source code)
